channel.title: Help Please [PI]
channel.description:
1) When I wield and attack a player with CCbow, y doesn't farcast/farattack/whatever you want to call it.
You attack and the character run into he's target and start attacking, looks like your meleeling, but your attacking with ranged.
[IMG]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/Caldito/ccbow.png[/img] Can't farcast / far range
Am having this problems with Ccbow, Morrigian Axes / Javs, anyway to fix it?
2) Am having problems with drops...
NPCDrops.tsm [code]#Bork 7134:140 886:150 1149:1 1249:1 1201:1 1319:1 1289:1 1185:1 1247:1 1147:1 1432:1 1113:1 1373:1 892:42 829:20 565:20 560:40 561:67 1149:1 14484:1 15221:1 15032:1 15029:1 15028:1 3140:1 4087:1 4585:1 1187:1 6585:1 995:5000000 12163:10 10330:1 10332:1 10334:1 10336:1 10338:1 10338:1 10340:1 10342:1 10344:1 10344:1 10346:1 10348:1 10350:1 10352:1 [/code]

item.title: Help Please [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

  1. When I wield and attack a player with CCbow, y doesn’t farcast/farattack/whatever you want to call it.

You attack and the character run into he’s target and start attacking, looks like your meleeling, but your attacking with ranged.


Can’t farcast / far range

Am having this problems with Ccbow, Morrigian Axes / Javs, anyway to fix it?
